SEARCH
Package com.example.project_seekdeep.Followings

Class FollowRequest

java.lang.Object
com.example.project_seekdeep.Followings.FollowRequest
public class FollowRequest extends Object
This is a class that gets instantiated whenever a new follow request is made between two users. It will then be used to store into firebase.

It stores: 
      follower: user that sent the request
      followee: user that receives the request
      status: either "pending" or "following"
See Also:
  • The only fragment that creates FollowRequest objects
